page.title: 08The Combine Club,Leckford
page.content: The{Combine club}is for people who live in{Longstock and Leckford}who work for the John Lewis Partnership. The club is quite big,it is like a pub,but on{Fridays}it is open for {children}to go as well.There is a place at the back where you can sit if it is not a Friday.Inside there is a game of Space Invaders which a lot of people like.The members of the Combine Club take turns to be the bar Lady/Men so it is fair.They have{darts {competitions}which are fun they have medals for the people who win.At Christmas they have{parties}for the children with Father Christmas, sometimes we go on a{trip}to Salisbury Playhouse to see a Christmas pantomime.
